title: Pair of 12-year-olds taken into custody in Winston-Salem homicide
content:
WINSTON-SALEM — Two juveniles were taken into custody in connection to the fatal shooting of a 15-year-old.
Jose Angel Chegue Mendoza, 15, of 3420 Old Greensboro Road Lot 39, was found with multiple gunshot wounds behind the Progressive Apostolic Church about 8:45 p.m. Friday, police said. He died at Wake Forest Baptist Medical Center.
Monday morning police took two 12-year-old males into custody in connection to Mendoza's death, police said. Additional details on their arrest was not immediately available, including their charges.
Police said they are not looking for additional suspects.
Investigators previously said the shooting was not random and that Mendoza knew his attackers.
This was the 16th homicide of the year in Winston-Salem, double the amount at this time in 2015.
